<h1 align="center">Microsoft Todo Chrome Extension</h1>

Microsoft Todo Chrome Extension is an open-source MIT-licensed browser extension that design to link Microsoft account and manage todo list efficiently.

Attention: This extension needs an account on Microsoft, if you don't have, please go to [Microsoft Tasks](https://to-do.office.com/tasks/) to create one.

<p align="center">
  <img src="https://img.shields.io/badge/chrome-extension-blue?style=for-the-badge&logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,">
  <img alt="semantic-release" src="https://img.shields.io/badge/semantic--release-conventionalcommits-e10079?style=for-the-badge&logo=semantic-release">
</p>

# Usage

## 1. Install extension

[<img width="64px" src="https://fonts.gstatic.com/s/i/productlogos/chrome_store/v7/192px.svg">](https://chromewebstore.google.com/)

You can also download this extension file from [Github Release](https://github.com/wood3n/ms-todo-chrome-extension/releases) and install it manually.

## 2. Sign in microsoft account

Cick the extension icon and sign in with your Microsoft account.

![sign in](./intro/sign-in.png)

## 3. Use extension to manage todo list

You can continue to add todo task in the extension, the task data will be synced to Microsoft Tasks.
